sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>kiss</radical> <kanji>each</kanji> of your best pals to show them how much you love and care for them. You kiss each friend right on the mouth.
meaningInfo: Imagine kissing each of your best friends on the mouth. Does this make you uncomfortable? Excited? Both? Feel that feeling.
readingMnemonic: Actually, <kanji>each</kanji> of your best pals are of the <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>) variety. By that, I mean they are both roosters. Imagine kissing both of these cocks on their beaks.
readingInfo: Kissing the cock beak is kind of a strange experience. Feel the feathers in your hands as you steady the cock to kiss it. Cock-a-doodle-doo!
